docs.text: " idle hands " is distasteful , crass and derivative .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if an original thought found its way into this horror-comedy it would die of loneliness .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: plus , you have to question the judgment and sensitivity of studio executives who would green light the release of a movie dealing with the slaughter of innocent teen-agers the week after the tragedy in littleton , colo .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the movie is insulting to horror film fans and teen-agers .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the plot , what little there is , deals with anton ( devon sawa ) , a high-school slacker who's hand goes on a murderous rampage after becoming possessed .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: along the way the hand kills anton's parents and his two best friends .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the friends , also slackers , are so lazy that they return from the dead because the walk into the light was too far for them .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: that is the level of this's atrocity's humor .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the movie treats death as a joke .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " idle hands " is gruesome and morbid .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the performances are stereotypical and cartoonish .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i realize this is supposed to pass for comedy , but recent events have surpassed what is on the screen .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is not the fault of the filmmakers that real life has overtaken reel life .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and i can only presume that the writers of " idle hands , " terri hughes and ron milbauer , were trying to make some statement about today's young people and their values in a satiric vein .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: however , it's hard to laugh at death these days , especially ones involving young people .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: with the real horrors of the world put before us on television , a stale pastry such as " idle hands " should be held from release for a few weeks or months to give us time to catch our collective breaths .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: " idle hands " is bad , no matter the circumstances in the world outside .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but the context of recent events only heightens its shortcomings .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the time is not right for this type of movie .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and as far as " idle hands " goes , the time may never be right .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this is a movie that shoud be consigned to the trash bin of cinema .
docs.label: negative
